tiled_message:
To get you started, you'll need Tiled to create and modify the maps in your game.

This free software offers a host of tools to make your life easier.
maps_message:
Pokémon Studio provides a link between Tiled and RPG Maker XP.

Tiled maps imported into Pokémon Studio can then be opened with RPG Maker XP.
createGame_message: At last, you're back in RPG Maker XP to add the commands that will bring your maps to life.
